title: Odd Sock Learns About Christmas
description: "Odd Sock Learns About Christmas" (Children's eBook) An Early Chapter Book - ***featuring POP-UP TEXT*** Fun story, facts and craft activities for younger readers. Every page of the story is illustrated in colour. Suitable for ages 5-8Join Odd Sock and the Top of the Wardrobe Gang as they prepare for a magical Christmas. Odd is hoping for a present from Santa, but does Santa ever give presents to cuddly toys? Follow her search for more knowledge about Christmas, and about the man in red, then discover what she finally finds out about the true meaning of Christmas. A heartwarming tale of friendship and belief. The story is accompanied by Odd's own fact sheets on all things Christmas, and her step-by-step instructions for some simple Christmas decorations that you can make for yourself! Although recommended for ages 5-8, this book will also be enjoyed by cuddly toy lovers of any age - especially those who believe in the magic of the holiday season!
author: Melinda Kinsman
